hero.tagline: Engineering, presence and purpose in the same flow
hero.heading: We don't deliver code, we deliver clarity.
hero.description: Founded in 2019 by a developer who traded autopilot for authorship, PHCruz transforms uncertainty into a clear roadmap. We take care of every stage of development — planning, execution and publishing — with consistent deliveries, constant participation and shared decisions: you follow, guide and see the product happen.
hero.tagline2: We create digital products with rhythm, precision and real involvement.

manifesto.label: Manifesto
manifesto.title: Living engineering, continuous co-authorship.
manifesto.text:
Technology is living language.
It's not just about code, but about presence — building something that breathes together with those who use it.

PHCruz is born from dissatisfaction with the automatic.
Software cannot be made at a distance from the human.
Each system needs a soul: people who participate, opine and shape.

We don't deliver code, we deliver clarity.
And that clarity is born from collaboration.

Engineering is our language, but not our limit.
Product is continuous conversation between intention and execution.
Precision only makes sense when there's purpose.
Here we don't finish software: we cultivate continuity.

Being part of the process is more than following — it's leading the creation.
It's making technology operate in real time with the life it serves.

about.label: Who leads
about.title: I'm Pedro Henrique Cruz.
about.bio1: I've been developing since 2012 and transform dissatisfaction into structure. I worked at large companies as a senior developer, but decided to follow another path: rebuild the relationship between software and people.
about.bio2: PHCruz was born from that decision. Uniting engineering, autonomy and presence. Because the future of development is not about delivering faster, but delivering with meaning.

mantra.label: Mantra
mantra.text: We don't deliver code, we deliver clarity. Each step is co-authorship, each decision has purpose and each delivery keeps the product alive together with those who use it.
